column5: To all our guests... Doug and I are o.k. but we lost our home due to a house fire on Sunday, January 20th, 2019. We have lost all our records, contact information as well as our business phone line (807-222-3333). We have the same cell # (for those that have it). Please text, email or message us your name and phone # so we can update our records. The Ear Falls Fire Department were excellent and saved our cabins so we will be operating for the 2019 fishing season. Just in case any of you guys are booked there.
That's sad. Glad everyone is OK!
Those two have had way too much sadness in their lives these last few years. Glad to hear they weren't hurt.
Sorry for the bad news, no one needs additional stress in their lives. Bill
Do you have camp boats or must I bring my own?If you have camp boats what are your housekeeping rates.
Here is the link to their website. should have everything you would need to know.http://www.gawleyslittlebeaver.com/ PjShorthorn
So sorry for your loss! Hopefully you'll have a quick recovery and a bright future this coming season!
I looked at the website and can not find anything about camp boats or fishing packages.

If you visit the web site and click on RATES, you will see the cost for a stay there. That same page has a sentence about "bring your own boat". Perhaps these folks could arrange the rental from a nearby camp if you don't own your own boat.
Great camp! Sorry for their loss of a home. I hope all goes well as they rebuild. They have nice cabins, great docks and are a perfect camp if you like to fish from your own boat!
